item.description:
$20.00 credit cards accepted

Come join sound workers Heidi Laura and Suan Armstrong in an evening of Sonic Bliss. Expect to lie down comfortably while you are blanketed in vibrational ecstasy.

Embody joy and divine bliss in the Dances of Universal Peace.

Lie down and allow the sounds of the singing bowls, gongs, chimes, and flutes to purify your subtle bodies and transport you into a deeply restorative meditation.

Make way for new possibilities supported by the vibrant energies of Spring. Gift yourself with this unique experience relax, recharge, and recreate with the upcoming Vernal Equinox!

Space is limited, the last show sold out!! We have 11 confirmed that aren't Meetup members, so we encourage you to RSVP ASAP!! LOL!!

(also, only rsvp "Yes" if you are absolutely certain that you will be coming!! We don't want to disappoint anyone....THANKS!!)

Heidi Laura & Suan Armstrong
The Essence of Being at Johnnycake Mountain
184 Johnnycake Mountain Road: Burlington, CT
www.theessenceofbeingat.com
To register contact John or Lisl: 860-922-6846 or 860-673-6863
Email: essenceofbeing@hotmail.com
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the "Essence of Being" sign by the road, come down the driveway and go left where it splits off. Parking is in the lot with the red barn.
item.name: Sonic Bliss - Encore performance
